# ProgressionExtensions.Add method

`Result = BaseValue + Bonus` OR`OR = 2*BaseValue + Bonus`, if `doubleBaseValue` is `true`

```csharp
public static ContextRankConfig Add(this ContextRankConfig config, int bonus, 
    bool doubleBaseValue = false)
```

## Remarks

Implements BonusValue and DoublePlusBonusValue
